entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 11:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -13.1°C

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
